about-me.headline: Who I am
about-me.title: About me
about-me.content: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Munich. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about-me.location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely
about-me.mindset: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills
about-me.profession: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life

skillset.description: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skillset.contactText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skillset.interest: I have a special interest in learning

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve
contact.subtext: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.name: Name
contact.nameText: Oops! It seems your name is missing
contact.messageText: What do you need to develop?
contact.privacyText3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.overlayText: I will get back to you as soon as possible.
